name: Prototype (itch) (Lophee, DustyJinx, JuuzouBLAACK, Fusselkop, gerald)
description:
Prototype is a project made by Gérald Montúfar, Immanuel Bücking, Martin Späth, Chloe Jinx Duscha and Pascal Mennerich for an university assignment.

Description

Hello there! Thank you for coming to today's playtesting-session. Feel free to look around, and, once you're ready, sit down at the desk and play to your heart's content. 

If you like, you can login to Twitch and have your viewers choose how your game is going to play out. 

Shoot your way through infinite, procedurally generated levels and floors and battle fierce enemies and big bosses with your whacky banana-gun. How long can you survive? 

Feedback

We would love to hear what you think! Either comment here or message either one of us:

  • Gérald: Twitter @geraldsaccount
  • Martin: Martin.Spaeth94@hotmail.de
  • Immanuel: immanuel.buecking.bsns@gmail.com
  • Jinx: Twitter @dev_jinx
  • Pascal: Twitter @LoFiGameDev

Don't be shy, feedback is always welcome :)

Legal stuff

All assets in this game are either free to use, already owned or made by one of us. No copyright infringement or any sort of violation intended. Should we have somehow missed any details, failed to mention any creators or used anything without permission, please contact us and we will sort it out ASAP.
